Package client.net

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.net.Client
  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as the starter for the client.

    It starts a threaded Sender and a threaded Receiver necessary to receive and send messages.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parses ip and port, asks for a username and establishes a connection to a server.

        Arguments are then used to create a connection to a server through a socket. If a connection is successful, an instance of each, Send and Receive, are created. After that, the user will be informed to which socket a connection has been established.

        Parameters:
        args - required information for a connection: ip and port

      • exit

        static void exit()
        Kills the main thread and with that all other running threads.

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName()
